titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Story Family History Collection, 1978-1980, 1991

profiledesc.creation: Original EAD encoding by Amy E. Armstrong according to TARO 2 EAD 2002 Editing Instructions. February 2008

did.head: Descriptive Summary

extref.corpname: Dolph Briscoe Center for American History,The University of Texas at Austin

did.abstract: Ernestine Story Carr was born on April 22, 1920 in Wylie, Texas. She married former Texas Speaker of the House of Representatives, Waggoner Carr in 1941. Collection contains genealogical newsletters concerning the Story family, particularly George Storey and Nancy Cantor.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ernestine Story Carr was born on April 22, 1920 in Wylie, Texas. She graduated from Texas Tech University in 1941 with a Bachelor of Science in Home Economics Education. She married former Texas Speaker of the House of Representatives, Waggoner Carr in 1941.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection contains genealogical newsletters concerning the Story family, particularly George Storey and Nancy Cantor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Story Family History Collection, 1978-1980, 1991, Dolph Briscoe Center for American History, The University of Texas at Austin.

did.unittitle: Genealogical Newsletters: “The Story Source” and “The Stor(e)y Story,” 1978-1980, 1991
